full_summary:
### Title: 
Professional Services for HR Director Software Application
==============================

### Notice Type:
Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)

### Solicitation Number:
20222469

### Description:
The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions Canada (OSFI) requires professional services for ASL Consulting’s HR Director software application.

### Submission Parameters:
The closing date for submission of statements of capabilities is March 22, 2023, 14:00 Eastern Time. Any supplier interested in providing professional services must demonstrate their ability to meet the requirements outlined in this notice.

### Requirements:
- Provide customizations and enhancements to the ASL HR Director suite and Performance Management module based on OSFI’s business requirements.

### Trade Agreements:
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Revised World Trade Organization - Government Procurement Agreement (WTO-AGP), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.

### Notice of Pre-Selected Supplier:
ASL Consulting is the sole owner and has exclusive rights to the source code for the HR Director software application. This is necessary for enhancing functionalities.

### Contract Duration:
The proposed contract is for a period of one (1) year from April 1, 2023 to March 31, 2024 with three (3) options to extend the contract for up to a period of one (1) year each.

### Cost Estimate:
The estimated value of the contract, including options, is $337,500.00 CAD (HST extra).

### Submission of Statements of Capabilities:
Suppliers interested in submitting a statement of capabilities must do so in writing to the contracting authority at contracting@osfi-bsif.gc.ca by the closing date of March 22, 2023.

### Contact:
For inquiries, please contact Andrew Bryant, Contracting Officer at contracting@osfi-bsif.gc.ca

### Important Details:

*   This is an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN), indicating the government’s intention to award a contract to ASL Consulting for professional services.
*   Other suppliers who demonstrate their ability to meet the requirements outlined in this notice may proceed to a full tendering process.
